title: Ticket Dashboard
custom_preconds:
Given it is the off season
And the user is looking at the ticket dashboard

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps on any ballpark in the team picker
And the user taps/swipes over to the ticket dashboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see the off season ticket dashboard
And all modules should be removed except for the ticket forward section, ticket/more information section, and manage ticket accounts button

NOTE:ticket forward section should not appear if the user has not made any transfer at all

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user first navigates to the ticket dashboard for a ballpark in off season mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should not see the link account notification ever pop up

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on either the sent/forward button on the ticket forward section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be directed to the ticket forward page, and the user will see a list of transaction made with the current user account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on any cell under more/ticket information section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be brought to the corresponding web view

title: Ballpark Guide
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the ballpark guide
And it is off season

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects a ballpark from the team picker
And the user taps/swipe over to the ballpark guide
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see the regular ballpark guide, but the upcoming game cell should display something related to "Thank you for visiting"
And the user should still be able to use any feature offered on the ballpark guidee
